sections.Biography:
===Background===
[[File:King's Landing taylor Dark Wings Dark Words.jpg|thumb|Joffrey fusses over new clothes with the tailor.]]
He is a royal tailor in [[King's Landing]].
===[[Season 3]]===
King [[Joffrey Baratheon|Joffrey]] is being fitted in his chambers for his upcoming wedding to [[Margaery Tyrell]]. The tailor fits Joffrey in his new clothes, but Joffrey finds the flower embroidery insulting and tells him off. When the tailor returns, Joffrey admires the new cloth and praises the tailer.<ref>"[[Dark Wings, Dark Words]]"</ref>
